SkyLightMapTransformSetter Class Reference

This class exposes a 2x4 matrix to the effect file engine, which transforms from world position to texture coordinate space. More...

Detailed Description

This class exposes a 2x4 matrix to the effect file engine, which transforms from world position to texture coordinate space.
